exceptions.exn: The LHS of scal_distr_r (scal (plus _ _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment c : R a : nat -> R x : R H : forall (x0 y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (plus x0 y) u = plus (scal x0 u) (scal y u) Unable to unify "Series ?M2527 = Series ?M2528" with "Series (fun k : nat => scal c (a k) * x ^ k) = c * Series (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k)".
The LHS of Series_scal_l (Series (fun n : nat => _ * _ n)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment c : R a : nat -> R x : R H : forall (x0 y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (plus x0 y) u = plus (scal x0 u) (scal y u) H1 : forall (x0 y : ?K0) (u : ?V0), scal (plus x0 y) u = plus (scal x0 u) (scal y u) H0 : forall a b : nat -> R, (forall n : nat, a n = b n) -> Series a = Series b H4 : forall (x0 y : ?K1) (u : ?V1), scal (plus x0 y) u = plus (scal x0 u) (scal y u) H2 : forall (c : R) (a : nat -> R), Series (fun n : nat => c * a n) = c * Series a Unable to unify "c * Series (fun k : nat => a k * x ^ k)" with "Series (fun k : nat => scal c (a k) * x ^ k)".

original: unfold PSeries. unfold PS_scal. rewrite scal_distr_r. apply Series_ext. intros. rewrite Series_scal_l. reflexivity.
